Package t10.gamepad.input.types

Class GJoystick

java.lang.Object
t10.gamepad.input.types.GJoystick
All Implemented Interfaces:
GAnalog<GJoystick>, GInput, Loop
public class GJoystick extends Object implements GInput, GAnalog<GJoystick>
Allows more granular input for a gamepad joystick. Represents a joystick on the gamepad. The two joysticks are the two movable knobs.

  • Constructor Details

    • GJoystick

      public GJoystick(GController controller, Supplier<Float> xValueSupplier, Supplier<Float> yValueSupplier)
      Initializes a GJoystick. Internal use mainly.
      Parameters:
      controller - The parent GController object.
      xValueSupplier - Must return the x-value of the position of the joystick.
      yValueSupplier - Must return the y-value of the position of the joystick.
